glsa.title: Chicken: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities in Chicken could result in the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Chicken is a Scheme interpreter and native Scheme to C compiler.

description.p: Chicken includes a copy of PCRE which is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows and memory corruption vulnerabilities (GLSA 200711-30).

impact.p: An attacker could entice a user to process specially crafted regular expressions with Chicken, which could possibly lead to the execution of arbitrary code, a Denial of Service or the disclosure of sensitive information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Chicken users should upgrade to the latest version:
